metadata.name: Chicas in the city
metadata.description: History of our cities. I worked as an architect. My world was - my projects of quarters and future houses of people. When you do a lot of design, you get used to buildings and streets like people. You close your eyes, walk around places that don't exist yet, enter rooms and analyze how to live here. And then there were moving, traveling and 30 new countries. Here I fell in love. I was madly waiting for each new meeting, each new good morning, in a country still unknown to me, to sit over a cup of bitter coffee and observe the inhabitants, dogs, people and details! I am sure that cities also have a soul, they have character, mood and weather. As we have with you. Someone invented, designed, made them, but people change them and filled them with millions funny stories. And with this collection, I want to introduce you to various amazing places and events, and I will start from Valencia.
